member.name: T:EO.WebBrowser.Wpf.WebControl
member.summary: A WPF control that provides a thin wrapper to the class.

member.name: P:EO.WebBrowser.Wpf.WebControl.AutoProcessCmdKeys
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to automatically process shortcut keys.
member.remarks: By default, the WebControl class auotmatically processes shortcut keys in your Windows application such as shortcut key for a menu item. Set this property to false if this is not desired (for example, the Web page wish to handle certain shortcut keys).

member.name: P:EO.WebBrowser.Wpf.WebControl.WebView
member.summary: Gets or sets the associated object.

member.name: T:EO.WebBrowser.Wpf.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:EO.WebBrowser.Wpf.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:EO.WebBrowser.Wpf.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
